tool_description: A simple API to retrieve quotes from the TV show Brooklyn 99. You can search quotes from characters and episode, also with a random functionality Limit of 100 requests a day per IP address.
title: Brooklyn Nine Nine Quotes

api_list.name: /api/v1/quotes/random/from
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://brooklyn-nine-nine-quotes.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/quotes/random/from"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "brooklyn-nine-nine-quotes.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
